line.text: That you were once unkind befriends me now
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And for that sorrow which I then did feel
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Needs must I under my transgression bow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Unless my nerves were brass or hammered steel
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For if you were by my unkindness shaken
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As I by yours yhave passed a hell of time
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And I a tyrant have no leisure taken
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To weigh how once I suffered in your crime
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O that our night of woe might have remembered
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My deepest sense how hard true sorrow hits
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And soon to you as you to me then tendered
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The humble salve which wounded bosoms fits
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But that your trespass now becomes a fee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Mine ransoms yours and yours must ransom me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
